trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the component associated with this attribute has been inherited from a base class.
This class cannot be inherited.
<xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> represents the type and level of inheritance of a member.

When the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService> searches the component fields of a component to identify fields that are inherited from a base class, the method represents the inheritance level of each component using an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref> class with the specified inheritance level.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceLevel"></xref> that indicates the level of inheritance to set this attribute to.
Specifies that the default value for <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref> is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute.NotInherited"></xref>.
This field is read-only.
This field creates a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that indicates that the associated component is not inherited.
Override to test for equality.
The object to test.
`true` if the object is the same; otherwise, `false`.
Returns the hashcode for this object.
A hash code for the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref>.
Gets or sets the current inheritance level stored in this attribute.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceLevel"></xref> stored in this attribute.
Specifies that the component is inherited.
This field is read-only.
This field creates a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that indicates that the associated component is inherited.
Specifies that the component is inherited and is read-only.
This field is read-only.
This field creates a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that indicates that the associated component is inherited and read-only.
Gets a value indicating whether the current value of the attribute is the default value for the attribute.
`true` if the current value of the attribute is the default; otherwise, `false`.
Specifies that the component is not inherited.
This field is read-only.
This field creates a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that indicates that the associated component is not inherited.
Converts this attribute to a string.
A string that represents this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref>.
